Package com.esri.mo2.data.odb

Supports caching and serialization of objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CacheListener This interface listens to cache events.
DiskCache This interface is used for caching objects to disk.
DiskCacheListener This interface listens to disk cache events.
 

Class Summary
CachedObjectDataStore This object data is based on a disk based persistent heap and a memory based object cache.
CacheInputStream An ObjectInputStream which supports sharing objects with other CacheInputStream(s).
CacheOutputStream An ObjectOutputStream which supports sharing objects with other CacheOutputStream(s).
DiskCacheImpl This class implements DiskCache and supports the caching of objects to disk.
LRUObjectCache This is a LRU object cache whose maximum size is not based on bytes but rather number of objects.
ObjectDataStore This object data is based on a disk based persistent heap and a memory based object identifier hash table.
PersistentHeap A persistent heap uses the buddy system for dynamic allocation within a file on disk.
SharedObjects This class supports CacheInputStream and CacheOutputStream.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.data.odb Description

Supports caching and serialization of objects.
